Lyric:
[00:29.11]We've been standing in the rain all night
[00:32.56]Crying happy tears for you
[00:36.05]And ever since we've met, things feel right
[00:39.22]Like when a crystal meets a sunshine

[00:42.66]I can burn up in your flame all night
[00:46.07]And spread my ashes of the summertime
[00:49.28]Cause in the summertime I feel alive

[00:55.73]I can burn
[00:57.03]Burn up in your flame all night
[00:59.41]And spread my ashes
[01:00.39]Ashes of the summertime
[01:02.39]I feel just fine
[01:03.78]Making love all night
[01:05.78]I feel alive
[01:07.05]Dancing on the moonlight
